body:
Here are some tips and trick i have found to make it easy to have fun on the Avicus server

  1. Dont hackusate someone unless you are 110% sure. Most people are really laggy, have wierd ping, or are just plain good
  2. Dont worry if someone is hacking, the mods will take care of it. psych. no they wont. 
  3. Try to make friends early on, so when you reveal your hideous self, you will have some people to support you still.
  4. Just because there isnt a chat filter, dosent mean you get to scream and shout whenever you get 10-herted by {tag=6802eb9d566147698d7bb9f82e883595}
  5. And finally, never, ever, 














listen to {tag=b8377bcb8d4f4170bc7bc332d0e8585f}

listen to kycrafft
title: Tips & Tricks for New players
